001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render;
002
003import java.util.Base64;
004
005/**
006 * Utility-class to wrap inner-HTML or inner-SVG with outer HTML-tags
007 */
008public class OuterTagUtils {
009
010    public static String outerDivStyle(String innerHtml, String outerStyle) {
011        return String.format("""
012            <div style="font-family: monospace; font-size: 14px; %s">
013            %s</div>""",
014            outerStyle,
015            innerHtml.indent(2)
016        );
017    }
018
019    public static String outerDivCss(String innerHtml, String outerClassName) {
020        return String.format("""
021            <div style="font-family: monospace; font-size: 14px;" class="%s">
022            %s</div>""",
023            outerClassName,
024            innerHtml.indent(2)
025        );
026    }
027
028    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
029
030    public static int totalWidthPX(int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen) {
031        return roundCeil(fontSizePX * 0.61 * maxRowLen + 4);
032    }
033
034    public static int totalHeightPX(int fontSizePX, int rowsCount) {
035        return roundCeil(fontSizePX * 1.2 * (rowsCount + 0.2) + 2);
036    }
037
038    public static int roundCeil(double valueDouble) {
039        return Math.toIntExact(Math.round(Math.ceil(valueDouble)));
040    }
041
042    public static String outerSvgAttrs(
043            String innerSvg,
044            int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen, int rowsCount,
045            String outerStyle) {
046        return String.format("""
047                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
048                     style="%s"
049                     width="%dpx"
050                     height="%dpx">
051                <text font-family="monospace" font-size="%dpx" style="white-space: pre;">
052                %s</text>
053                </svg>""",
054            outerStyle,
055            totalWidthPX(fontSizePX, maxRowLen),
056            totalHeightPX(fontSizePX, rowsCount),
057            fontSizePX,
058            innerSvg.indent(2)
059        );
060    }
061
062    public static String outerSvgClass(
063            String innerSvg,
064            int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen, int rowsCount,
065            String outerClassName) {
066        return String.format("""
067                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
068                     class="%s"
069                     width="%dpx"
070                     height="%dpx">
071                <text font-family="monospace" font-size="%dpx" style="white-space: pre;">
072                %s</text>
073                </svg>""",
074            outerClassName,
075            totalWidthPX(fontSizePX, maxRowLen),
076            totalHeightPX(fontSizePX, rowsCount),
077            fontSizePX,
078            innerSvg.indent(2)
079        );
080    }
081
082    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
083
084    public static String outerImgSvgAttrs(
085            String innerSvg,
086            int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen, int rowsCount,
087            String outerStyle) {
088        return embeddedSvgTag(outerSvgAttrs(innerSvg, fontSizePX, maxRowLen, rowsCount, outerStyle));
089    }
090
091    public static String outerImgSvgClass(
092            String innerSvg,
093            int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen, int rowsCount,
094            String outerClassName) {
095        return embeddedSvgTag(outerSvgClass(innerSvg, fontSizePX, maxRowLen, rowsCount, outerClassName));
096    }
097
098    public static String embeddedSvgTag(String outerSvgTag) {
099        return String.format("""
100            <img alt="embedded SVG-iamge" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,%s" />""",
101            encodeBase64(outerSvgTag)
102        );
103    }
104    private static String encodeBase64(String outerSvgTag) {
105        return new String(Base64.getEncoder().encode(outerSvgTag.getBytes()));
106    }
107
108    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
109
110    public static String outerHtml(String outerTag, String title) {
111        return String.format("""
112            <!DOCTYPE html>
113            <html lang="en">
114            <head>
115              <title>%s</title>
116              <meta charset="utf-8">
117              <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
118            </head>
119            <body>
120            %s
121            </body>
122            </html>""",
123            title, outerTag);
124    }
125
126    public static String outerHtmlDivStyle(String innerHtml, String outerStyle, String title) {
127        return outerHtml(outerDivStyle(innerHtml, outerStyle), title);
128    }
129
130    public static String outerHtmlDivCss(String innerHtml, String outerClassName, String title) {
131        // TODO: there should be HTML-style section generated properly in HTML-head
132        return outerHtml(outerDivCss(innerHtml, outerClassName), title);
133    }
134
135    public static String outerHtmlSvgAttrs(
136            String innerSvg,
137            int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen, int rowsCount,
138            String outerStyle, String title) {
139        return outerHtml(outerSvgAttrs(innerSvg, fontSizePX, maxRowLen, rowsCount, outerStyle), title);
140    }
141
142    public static String outerHtmlSvgClass(
143            String innerSvg,
144            int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen, int rowsCount,
145            String outerClassName, String title) {
146        // TODO: there should be HTML-style section generated properly in HTML-head
147        return outerHtml(outerSvgClass(innerSvg, fontSizePX, maxRowLen, rowsCount, outerClassName), title);
148    }
149
150    public static String outerHtmlImgSvgAttrs(
151        String innerSvg,
152        int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen, int rowsCount,
153        String outerStyle, String title) {
154        return outerHtml(outerImgSvgAttrs(innerSvg, fontSizePX, maxRowLen, rowsCount, outerStyle), title);
155    }
156
157    public static String outerHtmlImgSvgClass(
158        String innerSvg,
159        int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen, int rowsCount,
160        String outerClassName, String title) {
161        // TODO: there should be HTML-style section generated properly in HTML-head
162        return outerHtml(outerImgSvgClass(innerSvg, fontSizePX, maxRowLen, rowsCount, outerClassName), title);
163    }
164
165    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
166
167    private OuterTagUtils() {
168        // prohibit the creation of utility-class instance
169        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Cannot instantiate utility-class " + getClass().getName());
170    }
171}
